name: Google Search - Solarized
description:
I applied Ethan Schoonover's popular Solarized style to Google search results. The Google homepage and search results have a minimal feel with the logo removed.

Please let me know if there is any interest in a solarized light style.
additional_info:
The solarized colors were chosen by Ethan Schoonover to reduce eye strain and for best contrast.  This style will keep your searches from being a blinding experience.  Note that google has thousands upon thousands of styles - so you may see things that don't match, but for basic searches, everything will work.

Read about the author and the color theme here:
http://ethanschoonover.com/solarized

Update 2014/04/30
That ever changing google bar.

Update 2014/03/23
Update to fix missing colors in google bar.

Update 2013/10/10
Fixed regression with 'google bar' due to Google update.

Update 2013/09/17 
Fixed to support non-US Google Sites.  Thanks tyho!

Update 2013/08/07
Changed source code to use LESS to make updating easier.
Fixed more ads
Added support for Google Images
Fixed quirks with button borders that appear


Update 2013/07/21
Made input boxes solarized light style
Themed 'sign in button'
Themed side bar results
Themed more ads 'shopping results' that appear
Added background to Google Images results and some theming
Themed 'related pages' sub results that appear below searches/
